member.name: Rule
member.summary:
The Game.Rule object contains game rules, including:
MinPlayer The minimum number of players.
MaxPlayer The maximum number of players.
StartRoom The game's starting room.
EntranceRoom The game's entrance room.
ExitRoom The game's exit room.

member.name: MinPlayer
member.summary:
The minimum number of players.
Example: "1"
member.remarks: The minimum number of players must be > 0

member.name: MaxPlayer
member.summary:
The maximum number of players.
Example: "3"
member.remarks: The maximum number of players must be < 5

member.name: SubTitle
member.summary:
The game sub-title.
Example: "A Scary Adventure"

member.name: Genre
member.summary:
The game genre, which can be:
text-adventure A text adventure game
Example: "text-adventure"
